term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - linear distribution isotherm in chromatography
term.title: linear distribution isotherm

item.text: A distribution isotherm which can be approximated as cS = KC.cM where KC is a constant.

notes.item: At low concentrations, all distribution isotherms (in chromatography) (in chromatography) tend towards being linear. KC is the distribution constant (in chromatography).

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 1591. 'Nomenclature for non-linear chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 1593 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668081591)
